Package com.brogrammers.agora.helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilterSorterHelper
    A helper class to help the views in sorting and filtering question lists
    ImageResizer
    This will resize an image that a user uploads to 64kb automatically to handle US 8s TODO: Implement IMAGE RESIZE
    md5
    We use an md5 hash function to generate the unique ids of the questions, and answers to retrieve the correct question/answer.
    QuestionLoaderSaver
    This is a helper class, responsible for the serialization of cached Question objects.
